activities: We service multiple clients with our hosted services. Our clients use our services to complement their existing customer information and communication processing systems. They use our service to acquire customer information via web-based lead capture forms and other web-type applications. They also can upload additional information from computer files. The provision of information in response to questions contained on these forms or applications, or the data contained in provided files, are completely at the discretion of our clients. Therefore, the data we store will vary by the client, but typically includes email address, first name, last name, phone number, postal code and/or other related contact information. Additional data may be collected by our clients and stored on database systems to better target or personalize various email messages.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Bluestreak agrees to fully cooperate with data protection authorities in the European Union or their authorized representatives, as well as authorities in the United States of America (including, without limitation, the Federal Trade Commission) and the State of Rhode Island.
